name: A pulsating voidplate sphere
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
